dimensions: Warp x Weft: 274.5 x 101.5 cm (9 ft. 1/16 in. x 39 15/16 in.); dimensions reflect 4 pieces stitched together
title: Fragment
description: Apple-green satin damask woven with feathery serrated leaves forming parallel serpentine trails from which spring peonies and other blossoms in lateral rows. Striped pink and yellow selvages.
name: Fragment
